messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Speaking of coffee....
messages.msgSnippet: ... LOL Well she s a celebrity whenever and wherever of course. :o) -- ~Mary The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the green earth,
messages.messageBody:
>>I just figured Casey was becoming a regular celebrity in Oregon!!>>

LOL Well she's a celebrity whenever and wherever of course. :o)
--
~Mary

"The miracle is not to walk on water. The miracle is to walk on the
green earth, dwelling deeply in the present moment and feeling truly
alive."

-------------- Original message ----------------------
From: "Ren Allen" <starsuncloud@...>

messages.subject: Speaking of coffee....
messages.msgSnippet: Gosh, Casey already looks so young in that photo! I remember explaining unschooling to the reporter that day.  Dang, I thought it was a NEW article!! I
messages.messageBody:
"Gosh, Casey already looks so young in that photo! I remember
explaining
unschooling to the reporter that day. "

Dang, I thought it was a NEW article!! I thought she looked different
because of the camera angle. I remember you mailing a link to an
article a while back, but I just figured Casey was becoming a regular
celebrity in Oregon!! It's the same article...darn.
It had yesterdays date, so I thought I was getting it to the list
first. It must have been a re-run? Or maybe the dates online are
screwy?

Ren

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Speaking of coffee....
messages.msgSnippet: ... Did you get my address? ... Gosh, Casey already looks so young in that photo! I remember explaining unschooling to the reporter that day. I told her she
messages.messageBody:
>>I was just trying to find an address to mail something to Mary Gold,>>

Did you get my address?

>>and I stumbled across this article, that features her dd, Casey.>>

Gosh, Casey already looks so young in that photo! I remember explaining unschooling to the reporter that day. I told her she could probably cause me lots of grief if she presented it wrong. I thought she did a good job with it.


--
~Mary, unschooling mom to Conor (16) and Casey (11)

"Just today I'm going to be utterly present for my children, I'm going to be in their world (not just doing my own thing while they do theirs), I'm going to really hear them, I'm going to prepare myself to be present starting right now."
~Ren Allen




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Speaking of coffee....
messages.msgSnippet: I was just trying to find an address to mail something to Mary Gold, and I stumbled across this article, that features her dd, Casey. I thought you d all enjoy
messages.messageBody:
I was just trying to find an address to mail something to Mary Gold,
and I stumbled across this article, that features her dd, Casey. I
thought you'd all enjoy this:

http://www.gazettetimes.com/articles/2004/07/27/news/community/tue02.tx
t

Very nice.:)

Ren
